column5: Can a person, and is it safe, to purchase a Canadian fishing license online? Any specific site? I found a site out of Marblehead called PermitMe. Thanks.

We just did this, andit is very easy. we got our licenses back with in 3 weeks. Go to the following link: http://discovery.gov.mb.ca/search?cl...n+&btnG=Search Click on the second link on this page, and you can upload a simple application and can either mail it or fax it.
Is there a web page for Ontario fishing licenses?
